name: github-issues
description: GitHub issue, PR and milestone management utilities

commit.description: Analyze changes and create a conventional commit. Args: [message] (optional)

new-issue.description: Create a GitHub issue with Why/What/How structure. Args: [title] (optional)

pr.description: Commit changes and create/update a PR. Args: [issue #] to close (optional)

work.description: Auto-work on unassigned issues. Args: [PR URL] to review first (optional)

set-milestone-recursive.description: Set milestone on all sub-issues recursively. Args: <milestone URL or owner/repo>

milestone-from-issues.description: Convert issues in a milestone into new milestones. Args: <milestone URL>

division-to-milestones.description: Convert Division-labeled issues to milestones. Args: <milestone URL>

move-subissues.description: Move sub-issues between parent issues. Args: <source URL> <target URL>
